en.title: Standing room only at FE's BEP Wed 13rd August 2008 at New HQ!
en.content:
FE's BEP Wed 13th August 2008 at New HQ was packed full of Members, Leaders and invited guests! It was standing room only! Everyone was impressed with the facilities and the ambience of the new office. It was a great start and augers well for FE's success!

Presidential Director KC Phoon gave an excellent presentation at the BEP. Sharing their testimonials were FE Spokesmen Jean Daniels (International Long Drive Golf Specialist), Wong Hong (Champion Bodybuilder), Bathi Allimuthu (World Kick Boxing Champion) and Ms Law (Champion Powerlifter). Jean Daniels performed demos with the QP together with a lifting demo of Wong Hong.
   
FE leaders Paul Lee, Maggie Loo and Sunny Niah also shared their testimonials and experience with the audience. MC for the BEP was Presidential Director, Bernard Foo. TQ, Bernard for a great job done, as always!
